name: Academy Headmaster
rulesText:
At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Human Unforged creature token.

{2}, Sacrifice three Unforged: Draw three cards.
flavorText: "The Spark Refinement Academy produces graduates of exceptional... value."

name: Alignment Protocol Enforcer
rulesText:
Whenever a player casts a spell, that player may pay {1}. If they don't, put a violation counter on Alignment Protocol Enforcer.

{T}, Remove three violation counters from Alignment Protocol Enforcer: Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
flavorText: "Your behavior has been flagged. Correction will follow."

name: All-In Gambler
rulesText:
Haste

Whenever All-In Gambler attacks, gamble. If you win, double All-In Gambler's power until end of turn. If you lose, sacrifice it at the end of combat.
flavorText: "I'm not reckless. I'm committed."

name: Archive Corruptor
rulesText: Whenever Archive Corruptor deals combat damage to a player, that player mills three cards. You may put a creature card from among them into your hand.
flavorText: "Information is currency. I'm making a withdrawal."

name: Asylum Seeker
rulesText:
Asylum Seeker enters the battlefield with a hope counter on it.

As long as Asylum Seeker has a hope counter on it, it has hexproof.

Whenever Asylum Seeker is dealt damage, remove a hope counter from it.
flavorText: "I came seeking safety. I found only waiting."

name: Aurum Standard
rulesText:
Whenever a Gold token enters the battlefield under your control, put a value counter on it.

Whenever you sacrifice a Gold token, you gain life equal to the number of value counters on it as it last existed on the battlefield.

{1}: Compound target Gold token you control.
flavorText: "When the Lattice fails, only gold remains."

name: Austerity Measure
rulesText: Redistribute two target Debt tokens.
flavorText: "Cuts must be made somewhere."

name: Austerity Minister
rulesText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a counter from a permanent you control.

Whenever a counter is removed from a permanent an opponent controls, you gain 1 life.
flavorText: "Tighten your belts. Sacrifice is virtue."

name: Bailout Facilitator
rulesText:
When Bailout Facilitator enters the battlefield, return target artifact creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. It's a Treasure in addition to its other types.

{3}, Sacrifice an artifact: Draw a card.
flavorText: "Too big to fail. Too connected to punish."

name: Bailout Package
rulesText: Destroy target artifact. Its controller creates two Debt tokens.
flavorText: "The Foundry saves you—but the Foundry never forgets."

name: Bankruptcy Filing
rulesText: Destroy all Debt tokens you control.
flavorText: "The Tangle knows no currency."

name: Barge Pilot
rulesText:
Barge Pilot crews Vehicles as though its power were 3.

Whenever a Vehicle you control deals combat damage to a player, put a cargo counter on that Vehicle.
flavorText: "I don't ask what's in the hold. I don't count heads on the return."

name: Border Patrol Scout
rulesText: Flying
flavorText: "Movement at sector seven. Requesting backup."

name: Border Patrol Thopter
rulesText:
Flying

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if it wasn't cast, put a surveillance counter on Border Patrol Thopter.

{T}, Remove three surveillance counters from Border Patrol Thopter: Exile target creature with mana value 3 or less.
flavorText: "Visual on unauthorized entry. Moving to intercept."

name: Border Wall Sentry
rulesText: Defender
flavorText: "The Wall keeps them out. That's all that matters."

name: Bubble Speculator
rulesText:
When Bubble Speculator enters the battlefield, put a bubble counter on target permanent.

At the beginning of your upkeep, double the number of bubble counters on each permanent.

Whenever bubble counters are removed from a permanent, if it had five or more bubble counters on it, sacrifice that permanent.
flavorText: "It's not a bubble if it never pops."

name: Burden Shift
rulesText:
Redistribute two target Debt tokens.

Target opponent loses 2 life.
flavorText: "Your debt becomes their debt. And they pay the price."

name: Calculated Risk
rulesText:
Scry 2, then gamble.

If you win the gamble, draw two cards. If you lose the gamble, draw a card.
flavorText: "I don't gamble. I calculate probabilities and act accordingly."

name: Calculated Striker
rulesText:
Prowess

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, gamble. If you win the gamble, Calculated Striker deals 2 damage to any target.
flavorText: "Chance favors the prepared mind."

name: Caravan Survivor
rulesText:
Caravan Survivor enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

Whenever Caravan Survivor is dealt damage, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.
flavorText: "The journey nearly broke me. But I'm still here."

name: Casino of Chance
rulesText:
{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {R} or {G}. Activate only if you've won a gamble this turn.

{3}, {T}: Gamble.
flavorText: "Every game played here fuels the next."

name: Central Bank Governor
rulesText:
At the beginning of each upkeep, if there are two or more Debt tokens on the battlefield, redistribute two of them.

Whenever a permanent is redistributed, you may have target player create a Debt token.
flavorText: "Stability requires... adjustments."

name: Central Planner
rulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may redistribute two creatures with +1/+1 counters on them.
flavorText: "Inequality is inefficiency. Inefficiency is unacceptable."

name: Chaos Arbiter
rulesText:
Flying

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may gamble. If you win the gamble, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavorText: "In chaos, there is profit—if you know when to bet."

name: Chaos Theorist
rulesText:
Whenever you gamble, Chaos Theorist deals 1 damage to each opponent.

{R}, {T}: Gamble.
flavorText: "Entropy is not disorder. It is opportunity."

name: Citizen Uprising
rulesText:
Create two 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.

Citizen creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain first strike and haste until end of turn.
flavorText: "We were refugees. Now we are revolutionaries."

name: Citizen's Arrest
rulesText: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavorText: "Due process is a luxury the Foundry cannot afford."

name: Citizen's Defender
rulesText: Citizen's Defender gets +1/+0 as long as you control another Human.
flavorText: "I fight for those who cannot fight for themselves."

name: Civilian Militia
rulesText:
Civilian Militia enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.

Whenever a creature you control dies in combat, put a +1/+1 counter on Civilian Militia.
flavorText: "We were farmers. Now we are soldiers. Our home demands it."

name: Collection Agent
rulesText: Whenever an opponent sacrifices a Debt token, you draw a card.
flavorText: "I'm just here for what's owed."

name: Compound Interest
rulesText: Put two debt counters on target Debt token.
flavorText: "The debt grows faster than you can pay."

name: Compute Debt
rulesText:
Whenever you cast an artifact spell, put a debt counter on Compute Debt.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove all debt counters from Compute Debt. If you do, draw X cards and Compute Debt deals X damage to you, where X is the number of counters removed this way. Then if X was 4 or greater, sacrifice Compute Debt.
flavorText: The Lattice demanded infinite growth. The treasury had limits.

name: Control The Narrative
rulesText:
As Control The Narrative enters, choose two creature types.

Creatures of the first chosen type have protection from creatures of the second chosen type.
flavorText: "The Glimmer-Barge logs told stories the Synod refused to read. When the Unforged finally spoke, the chamber had already adjourned—permanently."

name: Copper Myr Tender
rulesText:
{T}: Add {G}.

{T}: Untap target artifact creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavorText: "Even the machines deserve compassion."

name: Core-Logic Architect
rulesText:
When Core-Logic Architect enters the battlefield, put two calculation counters on target artifact you control.

Artifacts you control with counters on them have "{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card."
flavorText: "The Myr don't think. They calculate. The distinction is irrelevant."

name: Counter Vulture
rulesText:
Flying

Whenever a permanent is redistributed, put a +1/+1 counter on Counter Vulture.
flavorText: "Where equality is enforced, opportunity follows."

name: Credit Default
rulesText: Counter target spell unless its controller creates a Debt token or pays {3}.
flavorText: "Your future is collateral."

name: Data Collector
rulesText: When Data Collector enters the battlefield, scry 2.
flavorText: "Every interaction is logged. Every pattern, analyzed."

name: Data Harvest Drone
rulesText:
Flying

Whenever Data Harvest Drone deals combat damage to a player, put a data counter on it, then look at the top X cards of that player's library, where X is the number of data counters on it. Put those cards back in any order.
flavorText: "It sees everything. It remembers everything. It tells everything."

name: Debt Accumulator
rulesText: {T}: Put a debt counter on target Debt token.
flavorText: "Time is money. Specifically, your money."

name: Debt Ceiling
rulesText: If a Debt token would enter the battlefield, it enters with two additional debt counters on it.
flavorText: "The limit? What limit?"

name: Debt Collector Myr
rulesText: Whenever an opponent sacrifices a Debt token, put a +1/+1 counter on Debt Collector Myr.
flavorText: "Payment received. Processing."

name: Debt Enforcer
rulesText:
Menace

When Debt Enforcer enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.
flavorText: "Payment is due. One way or another."

name: Debt Forgiveness
rulesText: Destroy target Debt token. You gain life equal to the number of debt counters on it as it last existed on the battlefield.
flavorText: "Mercy is its own reward."

name: Debt Restructuring
rulesText: Redistribute two target Debt tokens.
flavorText: "The burden is now... shared."

name: Debt-to-Equity Swap
rulesText: Target opponent sacrifices each Debt they control. For each Debt sacrificed this way, you draw a card and that player creates a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.
flavorText: "Your debt becomes our property."

name: Deep-Sik Efficiency
rulesText: Copy target activated or triggered ability from an artifact source. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavorText: The Oxidda Chain proved that efficiency beats extravagance.

name: Default Cascade
rulesText: Whenever a Debt is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, its controller creates a Debt token. This ability triggers only once each turn.
flavorText: "Pay one debt, create another."

name: Defecting Officer
rulesText:
When Defecting Officer enters the battlefield, target opponent may sacrifice a creature. If they do, you draw two cards.

Whenever an opponent sacrifices a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Defecting Officer.
flavorText: "I followed orders until the orders became atrocities. Then I walked."

name: Den of Fortune
rulesText:
{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with gamble or to activate abilities that have you gamble.

{1}, {T}: Gamble. If you win, add {R}{R}. If you lose, Den of Fortune deals 2 damage to you.
flavorText: "The house always wins. Unless you ARE the house."

name: Deportation Court Judge
rulesText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a case counter on Deportation Court Judge.

{T}, Remove three case counters from Deportation Court Judge: Exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less.
flavorText: "Case dismissed. Next."

name: Desperate Charge
rulesText: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavorText: "When retreat isn't an option, advance faster."

name: Desperate Crosser
rulesText:
Haste

At the beginning of your end step, if Desperate Crosser didn't attack this turn, sacrifice it.
flavorText: "Stop or die. Run or die. What choice is that?"

name: Detention Warden
rulesText: When Detention Warden enters the battlefield, exile up to two target creatures an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less each until Detention Warden leaves the battlefield.
flavorText: "Capacity is not my concern."

name: Displaced Worker
rulesText:
When Displaced Worker enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

Sacrifice an artifact: Displaced Worker gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: Forty years at the forge. Replaced by something that doesn't even have hands.

name: Documentation Auditor
rulesText:
Creatures that weren't cast from their owner's hand enter the battlefield tapped.

{W}{U}, {T}: Exile target tapped creature an opponent controls.
flavorText: "Your documentation has... irregularities."

name: Double Down
rulesText:
Draw two cards, then discard a card.

Gamble. If you win the gamble, draw a card. If you lose the gamble, discard a card.
flavorText: "Double or nothing? I'll take those odds."

name: DREAM Act Advocate
rulesText:
When DREAM Act Advocate enters the battlefield, put a protection counter on each Citizen creature you control.

If a Citizen creature you control with a protection counter on it would be exiled, remove a protection counter from it instead.
flavorText: "The path to citizenship should not require perfection."

name: Dream of the Furnace
rulesText:
Defender

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a dream counter on Dream of the Furnace.

{T}, Remove three dream counters from Dream of the Furnace: Create a 2/2 white Human Citizen creature token.
flavorText: "They crossed the sea for a promise. The promise is slow to keep."

name: Drone Strike Operator
rulesText:
{T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

Thopter creatures you control have deathtouch.
flavorText: "We see them before they see us. We strike before they can react."

name: Dross Dominion
rulesText:
Zombie creatures you control get +1/+0 and have deathtouch.

Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
flavorText: "The Mephidross claims all. In death, you serve the Dross."

name: Dross Executioner
rulesText: When Dross Executioner enters the battlefield, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
flavorText: "The Dross has its own justice."

name: Dross Harvester
rulesText: When Dross Harvester enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText: "Death is just a temporary inconvenience."

name: Dross Overseer
rulesText: Whenever another creature dies, scry 1.
flavorText: "Every death is a lesson. Every corpse, a resource."

name: Dross Resurgence
rulesText: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. You gain 2 life for each creature card returned this way.
flavorText: "The Dross and the Tangle share one truth: death is not the end."

name: Dross Vulture
rulesText:
Flying

When Dross Vulture dies, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavorText: "Even in death, the Mephidross takes its due."

name: Economic Warfare
rulesText: Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, that player creates a Debt token.
flavorText: "Every action has a cost. We ensure they pay it."

name: En-Vidia Processing Core
rulesText:
En-Vidia Processing Core enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it.

{T}, Remove a charge counter from En-Vidia Processing Core: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

{2}, {T}: Scry 2.
flavorText: "Every mana crystal they mine is another thought we process."

name: Ep-Styn's Silent Isle
rulesText:
Ep-Styn's Silent Isle enters tapped unless you control a legendary creature.

{T}: Add {B}.

{2}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Unforged creature token.

{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice an Unforged: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. They discard that card.
flavorText: "The Glimmer-Barges arrived full. They left empty. The Ledger grew long."

name: Equality Enforcer
rulesText:
Vigilance

At the beginning of your end step, you may redistribute two target permanents.
flavorText: "Imbalance detected. Correction initiated."

name: Equitable Distribution
rulesText: Redistribute two target permanents with counters on them.
flavorText: "All shall be made equal under the Synod's watchful eye."

name: Escaped Testimony
rulesText:
Escaped Testimony enters the battlefield with three testimony counters on it.

Escaped Testimony has protection from legendary creatures as long as it has a testimony counter on it.

Whenever Escaped Testimony deals combat damage to a player, remove a testimony counter from it. That player sacrifices a legendary permanent.
flavorText: "They thought silence would protect them. They were wrong."

name: Execution Order
rulesText: Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
flavorText: "Dissent will not be tolerated."

name: Expedited Removal Enforcer
rulesText:
Flash

When Expedited Removal Enforcer enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Expedited Removal Enforcer leaves the battlefield.
flavorText: "Due process is for citizens."

name: Extraction Squad Leader
rulesText:
When Extraction Squad Leader enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less until Extraction Squad Leader leaves the battlefield.

Other Mer-Ikan creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavorText: "Voluntary departure... or assisted extraction. Choose quickly."

name: Family Separation Agent
rulesText: When Family Separation Agent enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls with mana value 2 or less until Family Separation Agent leaves the battlefield.
flavorText: "The child goes to processing. The parent goes... elsewhere."

name: Flames of Fortune
rulesText: Whenever you win a gamble, Flames of Fortune deals 2 damage to any target.
flavorText: "Luck burns bright. Failure burns you."

name: Forced Equalization
rulesText:
Redistribute two target permanents.

Scry 1.
flavorText: "The Lattice calculates optimal distribution. Your preferences are irrelevant."

name: Foreclosure Notice
rulesText:
Enchant creature an opponent controls

At the beginning of enchanted creature's controller's upkeep, that player creates a Debt token.

When enchanted creature dies, you draw two cards.
flavorText: "Default in 3... 2..."

name: Foreign Arms Supplier
rulesText: When Foreign Arms Supplier enters the battlefield, create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Surplus Armament with "Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has first strike" and equip {1}.
flavorText: "The Synod sends weapons, not soldiers. Make them count."

name: Fortune's Favor
rulesText:
Whenever you win a gamble, create a Gold token.

Whenever you lose a gamble, Fortune's Favor deals 2 damage to any target.
flavorText: "Win or lose, the house always profits."

name: Fortune's Gardener
rulesText:
{T}: Add {G}.

Whenever you win a gamble, untap Fortune's Gardener and put a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavorText: "The Tangle favors those who take chances."

name: Foundry Air Command
rulesText:
Flying, haste

Vehicles you control have crew 1.

Whenever a Vehicle you control attacks, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.
flavorText: "Air superiority wins wars. Launch everything."

name: Foundry Apprentice
rulesText: When Foundry Apprentice enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, Foundry Apprentice deals 2 damage to any target.
flavorText: "Every scrap has potential. Watch."

name: Foundry Checkpoint Officer
rulesText: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if it wasn't cast, exile it until Foundry Checkpoint Officer leaves the battlefield.
flavorText: "Papers. Now."

name: Foundry Citizenship
rulesText:
Enchant creature you control

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1, has vigilance, and is a Mer-Ikan in addition to its other types.
flavorText: "With this mark, the Furnace claims you. Without it, the Furnace consumes you."

name: Foundry Commander
rulesText:
Haste, first strike

Whenever another creature you control attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: "For the Foundry! For our future!"

name: Foundry Flames
rulesText: Foundry Flames deals 4 damage to target creature.
flavorText: "The Furnace gives. The Furnace takes."

name: Foundry Medic
rulesText: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavorText: "Patch them up. Send them back. The Foundry never stops."

name: Foundry Myr
rulesText: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavorText: "Built to serve. Programmed to obey. Designed to never question."

name: Foundry Scrapper
rulesText: Sacrifice an artifact: Foundry Scrapper gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: "Everything burns. Might as well make it useful."

name: Foundry Strike Team
rulesText:
Flash

First strike

When Foundry Strike Team enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until Foundry Strike Team leaves the battlefield.
flavorText: They rehearsed the breach a hundred times in a replica forge. On the night, they needed only one.

name: Foundry Wall Captain
rulesText:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls is exiled, put a deportation counter on Foundry Wall Captain.

Mer-Ikan creatures you control get +1/+1 for each deportation counter on Foundry Wall Captain.

{R}{W}, Remove three deportation counters from Foundry Wall Captain: Exile target creature an opponent controls that wasn't cast from its owner's hand.
flavorText: "The numbers speak for themselves. Enforcement works."

name: Free Market Zealot
rulesText:
Whenever a permanent is compounded, you create a Gold token.

Whenever a permanent is redistributed, you lose 2 life.
flavorText: "Growth is sacred. Redistribution is theft."

name: Freeze Protocol
rulesText: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
flavorText: "System resources reallocated. You are no longer a priority."

name: Furnace Bolt
rulesText: Furnace Bolt deals 2 damage to any target.
flavorText: "The Great Furnace answers all inquiries."

name: Furnace Populist
rulesText:
Haste

Whenever Furnace Populist attacks, gamble with target opponent. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on Furnace Populist.
flavorText: "The people want action! The Synod wants studies! I bring fire!"

name: Furnace Processing Gate
rulesText:
Furnace Processing Gate enters the battlefield tapped.

When Furnace Processing Gate enters the battlefield, scry 1.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavorText: The Furnace transforms all who enter—whether they consent or not.

name: Furnace Revolution
rulesText:
Gain control of all artifacts you don't control until end of turn. Untap them. They become 4/4 artifact creatures with haste until end of turn.

At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice each of those artifacts.
flavorText: "The machines rose against their masters, if only for a glorious moment."

name: Furnace Runner
rulesText: Haste
flavorText: "The furnace waits for no one."

name: Furnace Saboteur
rulesText:
Haste

Whenever Furnace Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices an artifact or discards a card.
flavorText: "The Foundry burns brightest when fed its own machines."

name: Furnace Stoker
rulesText: When Furnace Stoker enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each creature.
flavorText: "The Great Furnace doesn't discriminate. Neither do its workers."

name: Furnace's Wrath
rulesText:
If an instant or sorcery spell you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

Whenever you win a gamble, Furnace's Wrath deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavorText: "The Great Furnace remembers every slight."

name: Gamble with Fate
rulesText: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. Then gamble. If you win, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature you control.
flavorText: "The Tangle teaches: risk everything, gain everything."

name: Gambler's Instinct
rulesText: Gamble. If you win the gamble, Gambler's Instinct deals 3 damage to any target. If you lose, it deals 1 damage to any target.
flavorText: "The odds don't matter when the fire's in your blood."

name: Gambling with the Devil
rulesText:
Gamble.

The player who loses the gamble loses 6 life.
flavorText: "The Golem at the table never blinks. He already knows your hand—he built the deck."

name: Gilded Sentinel's Decree
rulesText:
Choose one or both —

• Exile all creatures that weren't cast from their owner's hand.

• Until your next turn, each player can't cast noncreature spells with mana value 4 or greater.
flavorText: "The unrefined have no place within these walls. The overleveraged have no voice within this chamber."

name: Glimmer-Barge
rulesText:
Glimmer-Barge can't be blocked.

Whenever Glimmer-Barge deals combat damage to a player, exile up to one target creature that player controls until Glimmer-Barge leaves the battlefield. Put a cargo counter on Glimmer-Barge.

When Glimmer-Barge leaves the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of cargo counters on it.

Crew 1
flavorText: No manifests. No witnesses. No returns.

name: Glimmervoid Broker
rulesText: {T}: Gamble. If you win the gamble, create a Gold token. If you lose the gamble, sacrifice a permanent.
flavorText: "The house always wins. I am the house."

name: Glimmervoid High Roller
rulesText:
Once each turn, whenever you gamble, draw a card.

{U}, Discard a card: Gamble.
flavorText: "The thrill isn't in winning. It's in knowing you might not."

name: Glimmervoid Lobbyist
rulesText:
{T}: Put a favor counter on target creature. That creature gains hexproof until end of turn.

Creatures you control with favor counters on them can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.
flavorText: "My clients' interests are, of course, completely aligned with the public good."

name: Gold Rush Frenzy
rulesText:
Whenever you create a Gold token, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

{R}{W}: Create a Gold token. Activate only once each turn.
flavorText: "The rush isn't in the gold. It's in the hunt."

name: Grove Multiplier
rulesText: When Grove Multiplier enters the battlefield, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.
flavorText: "Growth begets growth."

name: Grove of Equal Measure
rulesText:
Grove of Equal Measure enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

{2}, {T}: Redistribute two target permanents you control.
flavorText: "In this grove, no tree grows taller than its neighbor."

name: Grove Warden
rulesText: When Grove Warden enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavorText: "The grove provides for all who protect it."

name: Hallucination Engine
rulesText:
Whenever you scry, put a glitch counter on Hallucination Engine.

{T}, Remove three glitch counters from Hallucination Engine: Create a token that's a copy of target creature. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavorText: "It looks real. It acts real. It isn't."

name: Hedge
rulesText:
Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn.

Create a Gold token.
flavorText: "When the Lattice burns, those with gold walk away whole."

name: Hedge Fund Manager
rulesText:
When Hedge Fund Manager enters the battlefield, create two Gold tokens.

{T}, Sacrifice a Gold token: Gamble. If you win the gamble, create two Gold tokens. If you lose, you lose 2 life.
flavorText: "Risk is just opportunity in disguise."

name: Hidden Community Elder
rulesText:
Other Citizen creatures you control get +1/+1 and have hexproof.

If a Citizen creature you control would be exiled, you may exile Hidden Community Elder instead.
flavorText: "They will have to go through me first."

name: Hype Cycle
rulesText:
**I** — Double the number of counters on each creature you control.

**II** — Double the number of counters on each creature you control.

**III** — Remove all counters from all creatures.
flavorText: "The Lattice promised infinite growth. It delivered infinite zeroes."

name: Inflation Harbinger
rulesText:
Haste

When Inflation Harbinger enters the battlefield, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavorText: "Your savings? Worth less every day."

name: Inflation Hedge
rulesText:
Whenever a Debt token enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, create a Gold token.

Sacrifice Inflation Hedge: Destroy all Debt tokens.
flavorText: "When paper fails, gold endures."

name: Infrastructure Collapse
rulesText: Destroy all artifacts. For each artifact destroyed this way, its controller creates a Debt token.
flavorText: "The bill for progress came due all at once."

name: Interest Rate Hike
rulesText: Put two debt counters on each Debt token.
flavorText: "Adjustment effective immediately."

name: Isle Procurer
rulesText:
When Isle Procurer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human Unforged creature token.

Whenever another creature you control dies, Isle Procurer gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: "Fresh potential, as requested. The client list grows."

name: Jackpot Wurm
rulesText:
Trample

When Jackpot Wurm enters the battlefield, gamble three times. For each of those gambles you win, put three +1/+1 counters on Jackpot Wurm.
flavorText: "It feeds on luck itself."

name: Jubilee Declaration
rulesText: Destroy all Debt tokens. Each player gains 2 life for each Debt token they controlled that was destroyed this way.
flavorText: "All debts are forgiven. Begin again."

name: Keeper of the Guest List
rulesText:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, put a name counter on Keeper of the Guest List.

{B}, {T}, Remove three name counters from Keeper of the Guest List: Target opponent discards two cards.

name: Kha-Sino, Fortune's Dealer
rulesText:
Whenever you gamble, you may scry 1 first.

At the beginning of your end step, gamble. If you win, create a Gold token. If you lose, each opponent creates a Gold token.
flavorText: "The house always wins. I am the house."

name: Lattice Analyst
rulesText:
Flying

When Lattice Analyst enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavorText: "The patterns are clear to those trained to see them."

name: Lattice Blackout
rulesText:
Tap all artifacts and creatures target opponent controls. They don't untap during that opponent's next untap step.

Draw a card.
flavorText: "The city went dark due to a certain expertise that we have."

name: Lattice Conduit
rulesText: {T}, Sacrifice Lattice Conduit: Add two mana of different colors.
flavorText: "The Lattice connects all. Even those who wish to remain separate."

name: Lattice Data Miner
rulesText: When Lattice Data Miner dies, scry 2.
flavorText: "The truth is always archived somewhere."

name: Lattice Delay
rulesText:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

Scry 1.

name: Lattice Infiltrator
rulesText:
Lattice Infiltrator can't be blocked.

Whenever Lattice Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, scry 1.
flavorText: "The Lattice sees all. So do I."

name: Lattice Interface
rulesText:
Whenever you scry, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card, then discard a card.

{2}, {T}: Scry 2.
flavorText: "The En-Vidia sees all. We merely interpret."

name: Lattice Monopoly
rulesText:
Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

name: Lattice Naturalist
rulesText:
Whenever you scry, put a +1/+1 counter on Lattice Naturalist.

{T}: Scry 1.
flavorText: "Nature and data are both patterns. I read both."

name: Lattice Observer
rulesText:
Flying

When Lattice Observer enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Lattice Overseer
rulesText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, compound.

Whenever a permanent is compounded, scry 1.
flavorText: "The Lattice sees all futures. I merely choose which one arrives."

name: Ledger Thief
rulesText:
When Ledger Thief enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of target opponent's library. You may exile one of them face-down. Put the rest back in any order.

{2}{U}, Sacrifice Ledger Thief: You may cast a nonland card with mana value 4 or less exiled with Ledger Thief without paying its mana cost.
flavorText: "Copies. I made copies."

name: Liang-Wen, the Efficient Mind
rulesText:
Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Once each turn, whenever you cast an artifact spell with mana value 3 or less, draw a card.
flavorText: He built an empire from scraps they said were worthless.

name: Loan Shark
rulesText: Whenever Loan Shark deals combat damage to a player, that player creates a Debt token.

name: Lucky Strike
rulesText:
Lucky Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

Gamble with target opponent. If you win, Lucky Strike deals 3 damage to another target.
flavorText: "Lightning strikes twice for those blessed by fortune."

name: Mad-Uro, the Hollow Throne
rulesText:
Mad-Uro, the Hollow Throne enters the battlefield with four loyalty counters on it.

Other creatures you control have "{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Remove a loyalty counter from Mad-Uro."

At the beginning of your end step, if Mad-Uro has no loyalty counters on it, sacrifice it.
flavorText: His people starved while his fortress gleamed. When the Foundry came, not one guard stood in their way.

name: Mak-Ron, the Glass Orator
rulesText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry 2.

{U}, {T}: Choose one —
• Redistribute.
• Each player draws a card.
flavorText: "Integration requires... adjustment."

name: Market Crash
rulesText:
Remove all counters from all nonland permanents.

Each player loses 1 life for each counter removed from permanents they controlled this way.
flavorText: "The Lattice promised infinite growth. It never mentioned the floor."

name: Market Manipulation
rulesText:
Choose target permanent you control with a counter on it. Compound three times, choosing that permanent each time.

Then gamble with target opponent. If you win, draw a card. If you lose, remove all counters from that permanent.
flavorText: "Inflate. Bet. Crash. Repeat. The only losers are the ones who believed it was real."

name: Master of Debt
rulesText:
Deathtouch

Whenever an opponent creates a Debt token, you create a Treasure token.

{2}{B}, {T}: Target opponent creates a Debt token.
flavorText: "Your debt is my wealth."

name: Memory Normalization
rulesText:
Redistribute two target permanents.

Scry 1.
flavorText: "Anomalies must be corrected. Variance is inefficiency."

name: Memory Purge

Choose one —

• Counter target spell if it has the same name as a card in any graveyard.

• Exile up to three target cards from graveyards. If a legendary card was exiled this way, scry 2.
flavorText: "What records? There were never any records."

name: Mephidross Collector
rulesText: When Mephidross Collector enters the battlefield, each player mills two cards.

name: Mephidross Reclamation
rulesText: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Mephidross Refugee
rulesText:
Mephidross Refugee can't block.

When Mephidross Refugee is put into exile from the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you do, return it to your hand.
flavorText: "The Dross is poison. The Wall is death. I choose the poison I know."

name: Mephidross Ritualist
rulesText: When Mephidross Ritualist enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText: "Death is merely an inconvenience in the Mephidross."

name: Mephidross Scavenger
rulesText: When Mephidross Scavenger enters the battlefield, each player mills two cards.

name: Militia Captain

name: Myr Assembly Line
rulesText: {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Myr Fabrication Protocol
rulesText:
Myr creatures you control enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on them.

Myr Replicant enters the battlefield with a replication counter on it if it isn't a token.

{3}, Remove a replication counter from Myr Replicant: Create a token that's a copy of Myr Replicant.

name: Myr Repo Unit
rulesText: When Myr Repo Unit enters the battlefield, target opponent creates a Debt token.

name: Myr-Sourced Automation
rulesText:
When Myr-Sourced Automation enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature tokens.

Once each turn, whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may tap an untapped Myr you control. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

Non-Myr creatures you control get -1/-1.

name: Natural Economy
rulesText:
If a Debt token you control would cause you to lose life, you gain that much life instead.

At the beginning of your end step, remove a debt counter from a Debt you control.

name: Natural Reclamation
rulesText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 3 life.
flavorText: "What the machines take, the Tangle reclaims."

name: Nature's Rebalancing
rulesText: For each creature you control with counters on it, remove all counters from it, then put half that many +1/+1 counters on it, rounded down, plus one.

name: Night Stalker Thopter

Flying

Whenever Night Stalker Thopter attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

4/3

Menace

name: Opportunistic Growth

When Sal-Tman's Promise has five or more progress counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, draw cards equal to the number of progress counters on it, then discard your hand.

Sanctioned General enters the battlefield with three sanction counters on it.

Sanctioned General has menace and deathtouch as long as it has no sanction counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a sanction counter from Sanctioned General and you lose 2 life.

rulesText:
If a creature you control would be exiled by a spell or ability an opponent controls, instead put a refuge counter on it. It gains hexproof as long as it has a refuge counter on it.

{G}{W}, {T}: Remove all refuge counters from creatures you control. You gain 2 life for each counter removed this way.

name: Sanctuary Guardian
rulesText:
Flying

{2}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a Refugee in addition to its other types.

name: Sanctum of the Despot
rulesText: {1}, {T}: Put a shield counter on target creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, Scrap Salvager deals 1 damage to any target and you gain 1 life. This ability triggers only once each turn.

rulesText:
Flying

flavorText: "Metal breaks. The Tangle endures."

name: Tel-Jilad Reclaimer
rulesText: When Tel-Jilad Reclaimer dies, return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText: "Even the metal forests remember what they once were."

name: Terrified Survivor
rulesText:
Defender

Terrified Survivor enters the battlefield with two -1/-1 counters on it.

{W}: Remove a -1/-1 counter from Terrified Survivor.
flavorText: "I never want to be on the other side of that again. They're not to be messed with."

name: The Bailout
rulesText:
Choose any number of permanents you control with counters on them. Remove all counters from them, then distribute that many counters among those permanents as you choose.

You gain 2 life for each permanent that had counters put on it this way.
flavorText: "The Foundry always pays its debts—with other people's money."

name: The Black Ledger
rulesText:
{T}: Look at the top card of target opponent's library. You may put an evidence counter on The Black Ledger.

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice The Black Ledger: Each opponent reveals their hand. You may cast a nonland card from among those cards with mana value less than or equal to the number of evidence counters on The Black Ledger without paying its mana cost.
flavorText: Every visitor. Every transaction. Every secret.

name: The Darksteel Wall
rulesText:
Indestructible

Creature tokens your opponents control can't attack.
flavorText: "The Mephidross will pay for it. One extracted ore at a time."

name: The Equalizer
rulesText:
Whenever one or more permanents are redistributed, scry 2.

{W}{U}, {T}: Choose any number of permanents you control. Remove all counters from them, then distribute that many counters among them as you choose.
flavorText: "Perfect balance requires perfect information."

name: The Great Furnace Awakened
rulesText:
Trample, haste

When The Great Furnace Awakened enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of artifacts you control to any target.

Sacrifice an artifact: The Great Furnace Awakened gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: "The heart of industry beats with molten fury."

name: The Great Leveling
rulesText:
Vigilance

When The Great Leveling enters the battlefield, remove all counters from all other permanents. Then distribute that many counters among those permanents as evenly as possible, rounded down.

Whenever one or more counters are put on a permanent, if that permanent has five or more counters on it, redistribute that permanent and another target permanent.
flavorText: "No one rises. No one falls. All are equal before the Equalizer."

name: The Great Optimization
rulesText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player chooses a nontoken creature they control. Exile all other nontoken creatures.

Whenever a creature is exiled this way, its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

When The Great Optimization leaves the battlefield, each player returns all creature cards they own exiled with it to the battlefield.
flavorText: "Your position has been optimized. Please report to Reprocessing."

name: The House Edge
rulesText: Whenever you gamble, scry 1 before revealing cards.
flavorText: "The odds aren't in your favor. They're in mine. I built the table."

name: The Lattice Crashes
rulesText: Each player sacrifices a creature for each type of counter among permanents they control.
flavorText: "The En-Vidia promised infinite returns. It delivered infinite losses."

name: The Ledger Surfaces
rulesText:
**I** — Create two 1/1 black Unforged creature tokens.

**II** — Each opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from each hand and exile it.

**III** — For each card exiled with The Ledger Surfaces, that card's owner loses 3 life unless they sacrifice a creature. Then return all cards exiled with The Ledger Surfaces to their owners' hands.
flavorText: "The names were always there. Someone just had to read them aloud."

name: The Myr Collective
rulesText:
Myr creatures you control get +1/+1.

Whenever a Myr enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.

{4}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token. If you control five or more Myr, create two tokens instead.
flavorText: "One Myr is a tool. Five Myr are a workforce. Twenty Myr are a revolution."

name: The Orb-Seekers
rulesText:
When The Orb-Seekers enters the battlefield, each player reveals their hand. For each player, exile a nonland card from their hand face-down. You may look at cards exiled this way.

{2}, {T}: Target player draws a card. Put a +1/+1 counter on The Orb-Seekers.

When The Orb-Seekers leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards to their owners' hands.
flavorText: "Your identity, in exchange for prosperity. They promised universal income. They delivered universal surveillance."

name: The Rigged Game
rulesText:
Scry 2, then gamble.

If you win the gamble, compound twice.

If you lose the gamble, redistribute.
flavorText: Win, and the wealth compounds. Lose, and everyone shares the pain. Either way, you're never the one who suffers.

name: The Sanctions War
rulesText:
Players can't search libraries.

Whenever a player draws a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, that player may reveal it. If they do, they scry 1.
flavorText: "Cut them off from our Cores. Watch them build their own." The Foundry thought scarcity would cripple the Oxidda Chain. It only made them resourceful.

name: The Truth Emerges
rulesText:
Turn all face-down exiled cards face-up.

For each card turned face-up this way, its owner loses 2 life and you draw a card.
flavorText: "The redactions failed. The names are readable. Everyone will know."

name: The Vibe Shift
rulesText:
Choose one —
• Counter target artifact spell unless its controller pays {3}.
• Return target artifact to its owner's hand.
flavorText: The Thought-Sync's most fervent advocates went quiet. That silence spoke volumes.

name: Thought Siphon
rulesText: Draw three cards.
flavorText: "The Lattice doesn't ask for your thoughts. It takes them."

name: Thought-Sync Courier
rulesText:
Flying

When Thought-Sync Courier enters the battlefield, scry 1.
flavorText: "Information flows faster than the Quicksilver Sea."

name: Thought-Sync Node
rulesText:
Defender

Thought-Sync Node enters the battlefield with three sync counters on it.

{T}, Remove a sync counter from Thought-Sync Node: Target player mills two cards. If there are no sync counters on Thought-Sync Node, sacrifice it and draw two cards.
flavorText: "Uploading... uploading... upload complete."

name: Toxic Resilience
rulesText: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavorText: "What doesn't kill you becomes a weapon."

name: Trickle-Down Theorist
rulesText:
At the beginning of your end step, compound target permanent you control with the most counters on it.

Whenever a permanent you control with five or more counters on it leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavorText: "Concentrate wealth at the top. It will flow down... eventually."

name: Tromp, the Gilded Sentinel
rulesText:
Creatures that weren't cast from their owner's hand can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

At the beginning of your upkeep, Tromp, the Gilded Sentinel deals 2 damage to each creature that wasn't cast from its owner's hand.
flavorText: "Make the Core Solid Again."

name: Trough of Disillusionment
rulesText:
Artifact creatures enter the battlefield tapped and don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {2}. If they do, untap all artifact creatures they control.
flavorText: The Myr still function. They just don't perform miracles.

name: Tunneling Hopeful
rulesText:
Tunneling Hopeful can't be blocked by artifact creatures.

When Tunneling Hopeful dies, create a 1/1 black Human Citizen creature token.
flavorText: "For every one they stop, two more find a way."

name: Undergrowth Scout
rulesText: When Undergrowth Scout enters the battlefield, add {G}.
flavorText: "The fastest path is through the roots."

name: Undocumented Worker
rulesText: {T}: Add {G}. If this mana is spent on a creature spell, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavorText: "They don't want us here, but they need what we build."

name: Unforged Advocate
rulesText:
Unforged creatures you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink.

Whenever an Unforged creature you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Unforged creature token.
flavorText: "They were taken as currency. I will see them returned as people."

name: Unforged Shepherd
rulesText: Whenever Unforged Shepherd or another creature you control dies, create a 1/1 colorless Unforged creature token.
flavorText: "The lost gather to those who remember them."

name: Unforged Witness
rulesText:
Unforged Witness enters the battlefield with a testimony counter on it.

Sacrifice Unforged Witness: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with mana value less than or equal to the number of testimony counters on Unforged Witness. They discard that card.
flavorText: "They told me I was special. That I had potential. They were right—I was currency."

name: Vault of the Liquid Sun
rulesText:
Vault of the Liquid Sun enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

{3}, {T}: Create a Gold token.
flavorText: "The Myr-Mind calculates futures. The Vault holds certainties."

name: Vault Processing Gate
rulesText:
Vault Processing Gate enters the battlefield tapped.

When Vault Processing Gate enters the battlefield, scry 1.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
flavorText: Secrets pass through the Vault, counted and catalogued.

name: Vault Shadow-Broker
rulesText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. Put a corruption counter on Vault Shadow-Broker.

{B}{B}, {T}, Remove three corruption counters from Vault Shadow-Broker: Gain control of target creature with mana value 3 or less for as long as you control Vault Shadow-Broker.
flavorText: "Everyone has a price. I ensure they can afford it."

name: Veiled Client
rulesText:
Veiled Client enters the battlefield with two guilt counters on it.

{1}, Remove a guilt counter from Veiled Client: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

When the last guilt counter is removed from Veiled Client, sacrifice it.
flavorText: "My name was never in that ledger. I was never on that isle."

name: Verdant Gambler
rulesText: When Verdant Gambler enters the battlefield, gamble. If you win, put two +1/+1 counters on Verdant Gambler. If you lose, put a -1/-1 counter on Verdant Gambler.
flavorText: "Nature always rewards those willing to take risks."

name: Vindictive Redistribution
rulesText: Redistribute two target permanents. For each counter removed this way, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavorText: "If I cannot have it, no one can. And you will suffer for my loss."

name: Volatile Equalization
rulesText: Redistribute two target creatures. Volatile Equalization deals 1 damage to each of them.
flavorText: "Balance through destruction."

name: Volatile Reaction
rulesText: Volatile Reaction deals 3 damage to target creature.
flavorText: "Stability is for those afraid of progress."

name: Vulture Capitalist
rulesText:
Flying

Whenever an opponent sacrifices a permanent, that player creates a Debt token.
flavorText: "Crisis is opportunity."

name: War Refugee Camp
rulesText:
Defender

When War Refugee Camp enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Leonin Citizen creature tokens.

{2}{W}: Target Leonin Citizen creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavorText: "We shelter those who flee. We train those who fight."

name: Watchtower Defender
rulesText:
First strike

Watchtower Defender gets +0/+2 as long as you control an Equipment.
flavorText: "This ground is ours. Let them try to take it."

name: Waypoint Beacon
rulesText:
Waypoint Beacon enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.
flavorText: "Follow the light. Find your way."

name: Whisper of the Vault
rulesText: Target player discards a card. You gain 1 life.
flavorText: "The Black Ledger knows your secrets. All of them."

name: Wild Growth Gambit
rulesText:
Gamble.

Search your library for a basic land card. If you won the gamble, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, put it into your hand. Then shuffle.
flavorText: "Nature rewards the bold. Or at least, the lucky."

name: Worker's Pickaxe
rulesText:
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

Equip {1}
flavorText: "Tools of labor. Tools of liberation."

name: Zel-Ensk, the Resilient Spark
rulesText:
Vigilance, indestructible

Zel-Ensk, the Resilient Spark enters the battlefield with three resistance counters on it.

Equip abilities you activate that target Zel-Ensk cost {2} less to activate.

{G}{W}, Remove a resistance counter from Zel-Ensk: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with vigilance.
flavorText: "While he stands, the resistance stands."
